means: 说服( persuade的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The president persuaded the West to write off Polish debts.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统说通西方免除波兰的债务。

sentence.Network_en: Eventually Sam persuaded her to accept an offer of marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 最终萨姆说服她接受了求婚。

sentence.Network_en: Derek persuaded me of the feasibility of the idea.
sentence.Network_cn: 德里克让我相信这个想法是可行的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Through patience a ruler can be persuaded , and a gentle tongue can break a bone ., 恒常忍耐可以劝动君王 ; 柔和的舌头 , 能折断骨头.
she didn't take much persuading , ie She was easily persuaded .她不用人多费口舌（她很听人劝告)。
angry words before the meeting but were finally persuaded to agree ., 他们在会议前争吵起来 , 经劝说最后言归于好.
His new wife persuaded him to forsake his old drinking habits ., 他的新婚妻子规劝他改掉喝酒的旧习.

list.abs: But it also hit a way to persuade people to put down their pipes ., 同样地 , 这也正好说服人们放下烟斗.
nymphetamine ... Back in the forest 回到了森林 whispers persuade 无声无息 More with lady laid 美丽的仙女.
iLight... ... back in the forest where 被劝回那个 whispers persuade 有沙沙声的森林 more sugar trails 更多撒满糖的小径.
...项产品是什么,有什么用途,何处有供应. (2) 说服的方式(To persuade) 服性目标(Persuade category) 服性目标建立品牌偏好;鼓励.
any chance i could persuade you to take another ride ., 我能说服你再搭一次吗.
i want to persuade you to change your mind ., 我想劝你改变你的想法.

entry.def: If you persuade someone to do something, you cause them to do it by giving them good reasons for doing it.

example.ex: My husband persuaded me to come...
We're trying to persuade manufacturers to sell them here...
example.tran: 我们正在努力劝说制造商在这里销售。

entry.def: If something persuades someone to take a particular course of action, it causes them to take that course of action because it is a good reason for doing so.

example.ex: The Conservative Party's victory in April's general election persuaded him to run for President again...
example.tran: 4月保守党在大选中获胜促使他再次竞选总统。

example.ex: It was the lack of privacy that eventually persuaded us to move after Ben was born.
example.tran: 就是因为想要清静，我们最终在本出生后搬家了。

entry.def: If you persuade someone that something is true, you say things that eventually make them believe that it is true.

example.ex: I've persuaded Mrs Tennant that it's time she retired...
example.tran: 我已经说服坦南特夫人她该退休了。

example.ex: We had managed to persuade them that it was worth working with us...
example.tran: 我们已经让他们相信与我们合作是值得的。

auth_sentence.content: But he was persuaded to go along with it.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he was persuaded to go along with it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he was persuaded to go along with it.

auth_sentence.content: I persuaded her to rent their...potato barn to me.
auth_sentence.res_content: I persuaded her to rent their...potato barn to me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I persuaded her to rent their...potato barn to me.

auth_sentence.content: But she sounds like she could easily be persuaded.
auth_sentence.res_content: But she sounds like she could easily be persuaded.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But she sounds like she could easily be persuaded.

Sentence.sentence: I was so grateful, " Aarons says, " but I persuaded Pat to let me return the favour in my own way with season tickets to our little theater group.
Employers still need to be persuaded that older workers are worth holding on to.
